Question: Frontier.cool Inc. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Frontier.cool

Product 1: Arm-based Fabric Meta MPSoC

 - World's first FPGA-based MPSoC for the textile industry
 - Utilizes Field-Programmable Gate Array (FPGA) hardware
 - Aims to accelerate fabric digitization with AI technology
 - Cloud solution for rapid fabric digitization at scale
